pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Specify the binding structure of your data type with an expressive set of type combinators, and unbound-generics handles the rest! Automatically derives alpha-equivalence, free variable calculation, capture-avoiding substitution, and more. See @Unbound.Generics.LocallyNameless@ to get started.
This is an independent re-implementation of <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/unbound Unbound> but using <https://hackage.haskell.org/package/base/docs/GHC-Generics.html GHC.Generics> instead of <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/RepLib RepLib>. See the accompanying README for some porting notes.
